title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When the first Combo in the application is clicked, it should take focus and the caret should be displayed.
OB: Currently, when clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus and the caret is not displayed.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled as 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application 
2. Locate the first Combo labeled as 'Host:' 
3. Click on the Combo
